item.description:
Just thought someone might be interested in doing this. If so, I would be glad to pick up people along the way.

ART CONCORD SPRING EVENT!
Visit all of these local galleries and see the rich artistic offerings of the capital area, more details to follow!

When: from Thursday, April 15, 2010 5:00 PM to 8:00 PM

Where: Participating galleries including Mill Brook Gallery and Sculpture Garden, Kimball Jenkins School of Art, League of NH Craftsmen, Red River Theatres, Rowland Studio, the Sulloway Gallery, NHTI Library Gallery, and Franklin Pierce Law Center Gallery.

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: Art Concord Spring Event
